text: "Drunk Girls" is a song by American rock band LCD Soundsystem. It was released as the second single from their third studio album, This Is Happening (2010), on May 3, 2010. Band frontman James Murphy has described the song as "dumb" but added "I like dumb, short stuff."Reuters - LCD Soundsystem raises glass to "Drunk Girls" The 7" single features a cover of the song by San Francisco psychedelic rock band Wooden Shjips. ==Music video== The music video for the single was co-directed by Spike Jonze and James Murphy. The video features Murphy and bandmates Nancy Whang and Pat Mahoney attempting to sing while being abused by people dressed as pandas.Spike Jonze Co-Directed “Drunk Girls” Music Video for LCD Soundsystem The video was shot at Factory Studios in Brooklyn, NY. ==Track listing== ===7" single=== :A.
